example[0]: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
example[1]: The court found him innocent and he was released.
definition[1]: done or said without intending to harm or offend anyone
example[3]: He was startled by their angry reaction to his innocent remark.
definition[2]: not having much experience of the bad things in the world, so that you are easily deceived
example[4]: I was thirteen years old and very innocent.
definition[3]: someone who does not have much experience of the bad things in life
